member_organisations:

- New Energy Investment Bulgaria Ltd. 
- Chamber of Commerce and Industry Bulgaria-Korea

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: The European Center for Development, Implementation and Management of Projects (ECDIMP) is a member of the Bulgarian Chamber of Commerce and Industry (BCCI).
